example_sentences.example_en: I am going to be on time.

example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a eu une bonne journée.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to have a dog.
They are going to have a party.
She used to go to the park.
You will go to the store.
I am going to go home.
You are going to make dinner.
We have just done the laundry.
example_sentences.example_fr: Nous venons de faire la lessive.

example_sentences.example_en: I used to say thank you.
You are going to say something.
They have just said the truth.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de dire la vérité.

example_sentences.example_en: She used to see her friends.
They are going to see the results.
I have just seen the news.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je viens de voir les nouvelles.

example_sentences.example_en: We are going to know more.
You have just known about the surprise.
example_sentences.example_fr: Tu viens de savoir pour la surprise.

example_sentences.example_en: I used to want ice cream.
You are going to want help.
They have just wanted a new car.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de vouloir une nouvelle voiture.

example_sentences.example_en: They are going to come to the party.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils vont venir à la fête.

example_sentences.example_en: You are going to take the job.
I have just taken out the trash.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je viens de sortir la poubelle.

example_sentences.example_en: You are going to write a book.
I have just written a report.
They are going to read the email.
I have just read the instructions.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je viens de lire les instructions.

example_sentences.example_en: He puts the keys on the table.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il met les clés sur la table.
Elle a mis le livre de côté.

example_sentences.example_en: I used to put my shoes here.
We will put the chairs outside.
You are going to put salt in the soup.
example_sentences.example_fr: Tu vas mettre du sel dans la soupe.

example_sentences.example_en: I have just put the groceries on the counter.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je viens de mettre les courses sur le comptoir.

example_sentences.example_en: She used to take out the recycling.
We will take out the boxes.
They are going to take out the old furniture.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils vont sortir les vieux meubles.

example_sentences.example_en: I have just taken out the recycling.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je viens de sortir le recyclage.

example_sentences.example_en: He used to open the shop early.
You are going to open the file.
I have just opened the presentation.
I used to close the door.
They are going to close the shop early.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils vont fermer le magasin tôt.

example_sentences.example_en: I have just closed the document.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je viens de fermer le document.

example_sentences.example_en: She used to drive every day.
We will drive to the beach.
You are going to drive the car.
I have just driven to the airport.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je viens de conduire à l'aéroport.

example_sentences.example_en: They are going to run in the park.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils vont courir dans le parc.

example_sentences.example_en: I have just run five kilometers.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je viens de courir cinq kilomètres.

example_sentences.example_en: We will sleep at the hotel.
You are going to sleep longer.
I have just slept on the plane.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je viens de dormir dans l'avion.

example_sentences.example_en: They are going to drink wine.
I have just drunk a glass of water.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je viens de boire un verre d'eau.
